Name: Treasure Guzzler
Text: A wormy growth protrudes from the wall, it's mouth ringed with teeth.  Inside its gullet you see a glint of treasure

Outcomes.Text: You deftly avoid the teeth to get your prize.
Your arm is torn by the jagged teeth, but the prize is worth it.
The shine you saw was just a piece of colored glass... Completely worthless
Yeah, that doesn't look sanitary. No thanks.
